message.body: Any update?
That's okay! Sorry about your car!!! Were you able to change the tire?
Hey, would you mind rescheduling to next week?

I called my brother-in-law to ask him to look at it but I haven't heard from him. He's probably busy with work because it's the weekend. Want to see what he suggests I should do. I wouldn't even know where I should get a new tire. I wonder if that's covered into warranty. Ayyyyyy.
I wish I knew how to change my tire. Seriously something I need to learn!
Thank you and sorry again :(
Aw boo!!! Too much stress! Oh wouldn't know either. Good thing we weren't stranded! We'd be SOL.
SOL?
Ohhhg I just got it!

Shit outta luck. Haha
No problem! Next week it is!
Hahahah you kids and your lingo these days! That's the first time I see it used as "SOL"!
Haha. I don't actually know what it's supposed I be written.
Learned something new every day!
*learn
Haha. Here's some more:

SNAFU: situation normal - all fucked up.
TARFUN: things are really fucked up now.
FUBAR: fucked up beyond all recognition.
Not quite sure why they all have fuck in them, but whatever!
Hahaha. Random knowledge that I had. Haha.
Hahahah what???
I haven't even heard of the last two!
Well there ya go! Apparently it's used mainly in the military.
Wow, I'm thinking I must really be getting old and/or out of touch.
We should start using those more often! Or start using them generally hahah.
I know. I kinda want to too now. Haha. You're car situation is really TARFUN.
I agree! It caused such a SNAFU to our plans.
Haha. I like it!
